_assets.title: Class 2 Medicines Recall (action with 48 hours): Irbesartan 300mg Film-coated Tablets - Accord Healthcare Limited (EL (13)A/32) (69Kb)

body:
## DRUG ALERT

CLASS 2 MEDICINES RECALL

Action within 48 hours

  


Pharmacy, dispensing clinic and wholesale level recall  
  
23 December 2013  |   |  EL (13)A/32  |   |  Our ref:  MDR 30-12/13   | 

* * *

Dear Healthcare Professional,

Accord Healthcare Limited

Irbesartan 300mg Film-coated Tablets

PL 20075/0354

  
  
  
Batch number  |   |  Expiry date  |   |  Pack size  |   |  First distributed  |   
P02924  |   |  January 2015  |   |  2 X 14’s  |   |  11 September 2013  | 

Accord Healthcare Limited is recalling the above batch of Irbesartan 300mg film-coated tablets because the blister foil on a small number of blisters is incorrectly labelled as Irbesartan 150mg. All other labelling is correct and tablets present in the blisters are 300mg strength.  
  
Recipients are requested to quarantine any remaining stock and return it to their supplier for credit.  
  
For stock return enquiries, please contact Accord Healthcare Limited on 0208 8631 427 or email - [customerserviceuk@accord-healthcare.com](mailto:customerserviceuk@accord-healthcare.com).

For quality or medical information enquiries, please contact Accord Healthcare Limited on 020 8901 3370 or email - [safety@lambda-cro.com](mailto:safety@lambda-cro.com) and [uk@accord-healthcare.com](mailto:uk@accord-healthcare.com).

Recipients of this Drug Alert should bring it to the attention of relevant contacts by copy of this letter. Local area teams are asked to forward this to relevant clinics, general practitioners and community pharmacists for information.

Yours faithfully

Adam Burgess

Defective Medicines Report Centre  
151 Buckingham Palace Road  
London  
SW1W 9SZ  
Telephone +44 (0)20 3080 6574

MHRA Distribution (further recipients by cascade):  N/A 

### Download documents:  
  
  * [ASSET_TAG](#ASSET0)
